text: Kutchi or Kachchi is a language and is spoken in regions such as Kutch, India and Sindh, Pakistan. Over 50,000 people spoke it in 1998. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kutchi Language Online * Ethnologue report on Kutchi * GujarƒÅti script, used to write Kutchi Category:Indo-Aryan languages Category:Languages of Pakistan
title: Kutchi language
